analysis.summary: Email exchange between Michael Wolff and Jeffrey Epstein confirming a meeting time, with forwarded content from Lisa New discussing television production budgets, reality TV costs, and content ideas involving high-profile names like Clinton, Woody Allen, and Elena Kagan.
